ops_per_clock_notes.fp32: 128 cores x 8 FP32/cycle (double-pumped AVX-512) = 1,024 FP32 ops/clock
ops_per_clock_notes.fp64: 128 cores x 4 FP64/cycle (double-pumped AVX-512) = 512 FP64 ops/clock
ops_per_clock_notes.note: AVX-512 is double-pumped on Zen 4 (256-bit native)

theoretical_peaks_notes: Legacy field - calculated at base_clock_mhz (2250 MHz). Use ops_per_clock x clock_mhz for accurate peaks.
notes: Genoa flagship (EPYC 9004 series). 128 Zen 4 cores (256 threads). TSMC 5nm. Chiplet design (16x 8-core CCDs). Highest core count in EPYC 9000 series. Slightly lower clocks than 9654. 12-channel DDR5-4800. PCIe 5.0 with 128 lanes.
